content: *not quite a hippie poncho this fun wrap recalls the free-wheeling 1960 s lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40433 *chs-poncho pdf* corrections applied sep 14 2004 skill level easy size medium circumference at bottom edge 46 inches 117 cm length 17½ inches 44 5 cm gauge 3 shells and 5 row = 4 inches 10 cm in pattern homespun® article #790 4 colors 1 ball each *shown in boston rose baroque antique edwardian* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm stitches shell point shell worked in the round from the neck down chain tie make 2 flowers and sew to ties ends to finish see also 40275 groovy granny wrap 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/groovy-granny-wrap
